author: mmeisenzahl@businessinsider.com (Mary Meisenzahl), Mary Meisenzahl
title: Flight attendants are still working during coronavirus lockdowns and they worry that they're spreading the virus
description: REUTERS/Ricardo Moraes Some flight attendants are worried that they may be spreading coronavirus because of travel and lack of personal protective equipment. Flight attendants around the world are mostly exempt from lockdown order, because they're considered …
content: Along with doctors, nurses, EMTs, and other essential workers, flight attendants are on the frontlines facing COVID-19, the coronavirus disease. Several flight attendants told Time that they fear they're spreading COVID-19 with every flight they take and pass… [+535 chars]
